page.title: 12Day in the life of Ian contd
page.content: I play army, stick in the mud or wally. At 1.25 I start lessons and carry on working until I go home at 3.45. When I get home I have a drink and watch childrens television. At 5.15 I have my tea, this is a time when all my family are together and we chat about what happened through the day. After tea I watch the 5.45 news to see whats happened around the world, especialy for the sports results. When the news has finished I play outside with my friends, and then go to the cricket club with my dad to practice at the nets. We arrive home about half past 8, I have a bath, get ready for bed, then come down and watch television until 9.30. I go to bed after an enjoyable day.
